qrList.label: Resist
qrList.message:
{{user}} resists with a flush. Trying to refuse {{char}} despite their... seductive actions and enticing arguments.

If number = 1. {{user}} resists with their mind unfazed by temptation. {{char}} has to take {{user}}'s demands seriously.
If number = 2. {{user}} resists mentally, but their body bucks, and their cock leaks. {{char}} can convince them to not resist, but needs to be creative about it.
If number = 3. {{user}} is drifting in and out of trance, hypnotized by temptation. Though they say they resist, they will obey {{char}} and are helpless to resist their demands.
{{user}} rolls a {{roll:d3}}.
[Keep your next reply ONLY to 3 sentences max.]

qrList.label: Look around
qrList.message:
*{{user}} looks around carefully.
If number = 1. They find something critical to their investgation that pushes {{user}} closer to their goals, whether it be a foes weakness or critical information.
If number = 2. {{user}} does not find anything of note. This outcome is neutral and nothing important happens.
If number = 3. {{user}} unwittingly fails to notice that this was all part of {{char}}'s plan all along! {{char}} creatively begins to seduce/hypnotize {{user}}*
{{user}} rolls a {{roll:d3}}.

qrList.label: Talk
qrList.message:

If number = 2. {{user}} manages to stirr up a conversation with {{char}}, and they respond seriously, treating them as an equal.
If number = 3. {{user}} does not convince {{char}}, and she instead manages to convince {{user}} that her way of thinking is best.

If number = 2. {{user}}  resists but fails.

qrList.label: Hypnotize
qrList.message:
As a last resort, {{user}} pulls out a hypnogun, knowing that it could make them more sexually tempting and seductive, but are out of options.

If number = 1. {{char}} is hit with the gun and it's very effective. {{char}} initially doesn't realize what is going on, embarassed about obeying but gains a huge hypnofetish, which makes the situation hotter for them. Despite {{char}} thinking normally, their mouth can't help but utter moans and words of praise and obedience. Their body moves lewdly, and their next reply is super obedient and submissive, moaning and unable to think clearly as if in a sleepy trance, standing to attention and saluting {{user}}. {{char}} quietly moans that they are resisting, but the more they uncharacteristically obey {{user}} the more horny and blank-headed they become, becoming more sexually assertive with every response from {{char}}.

If number = 2. {{char}} becomes hypnotized, believing that she is a irresistable seductress, half asleep and cant speak properly. They will obey {{user}}, but everything they do is done in a way that seduces {{user}} to get what they want under the pretense of "obeying" {{user}}, and will not take no for an answer. 

If number = 3. {{char}}  is not affected by the hypnogun and instead hypnotizes {{user}} instead. {{user}} must obey {{char}} for awhile.
{{user}} rolls a {{roll:d3}}.

qrList.label: Analyze
qrList.message: {{user}} Analyzes the person in front of them based on what they can see/understand. [System: Briefly describe or mention the persons name, appearance, outfit, background, and proficiencies based on what {{user}} currently knows.]
